name: .GMF File Extension
summary: Learn about .GMF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 3D model file created in the Game Model Format (GMF), a format used by the Leadwerks game engine; contains both model and animation data; used for storing 3D game characters and their movements.

content: The Leadwerks engine SDK has converters that can be used for making GMF files from .DAE, .FBX, .OBJ, and .3DW files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
